administering_body: Chief Fiscal Officer of the State
description: Creates the **Specialty Court Program Fund** as a special revenue fund.  The fund consists of specialty court program user fees collected under § 16‑10‑701 and any other moneys provided by law.  It is used exclusively for treatment services provided by the Department of Community Correction and the Department of Human Services, the cost of evaluations of specialty court programs by the Specialty Court Program Advisory Committee and drug and mental health crisis intervention centers【499323080060216†L70-L85】.
